resource.item: Experience the fascinating world of brave space pilots in a real-time MMOG. Countless numbers of unexplored galaxies and thrilling 3D space battles await you in this online game. Real-life opponents turn DarkOrbit into one helluva action-packed, futuristic strategy game. Register now for this browser game and travel to the ends of the universe in the free-to-play game DarkOrbit.

Well done, pilot! You've made a really good impression on your company so far. To reward your efforts, they're offering you this advantage pack. You'll get x2 content of bonus boxes, awesome discount on weapons, ammo and equipment plus a Uridium bonus on a regular basis. With this pack, you're career will take off faster than you ever imagined!
The next time you purchase Uridium you'll receive XXX times the amount of total Uridium you bought.
Not valid during any other special events such as Happy Hours. For soccer events, the multiplier will multiply your original purchase value and will not multiply the goal-multiplied value.
Double your fun with this pack: The contents of every bonus box will be credited to your account twice!

The Loyalty Bonus will keep you in the black:
Every week we'll transfer 10,000 Uridium to your account!
Luxury for less: With this bonus pack, you'll get a 25% off every item you buy with Uridium!
Starter Packs - Revenge, Strike and Soldier Packs
New to DarkOrbit? Looking to get ahead? Then act now and save up to 30%!
Savings Packs - Challenger, Pro and Elite Packs
If you're good with money and know how to take advantage of a good deal, then get your hands on this offer and save up to over 50%!

The Jackpot Battle is on Sunday!


Start time:
  • All users are transferred to the battle map between 2:00pm and 2:10pm*, and automatically placed under attack protection.
  • Once all pilots are there, the game can begin!

Jackpot Battle procedure:
  • There are several maps with up to 500 randomly assigned players on them.
  • For pilots who are shot down the battle ends immediately.
  • Once there are only 500 players remaining in total on all maps, another announcement will be made and all players will be transferred onto the final map.
  • If no winner is determined by 5:30pm the radiation zone will slowly begin to spread towards the middle until the radiation zone covers the entire final map and mercilessly destroys the remaining finalists.

Finale:
  • The Jackpot finale ends at 6:00pm*.
  • The last remaining player wins; if there is more than one survivor, the winner will be decided with a draw.

Rules:
  • %disclaimer_winnings%
  • Participation in the Jackpot battle is completely voluntary and free.
  • NOTE: Players must have reached the age of 18 in order to compete in the battle!

%Timezone_Def%
The winner gets their Jackpot paid out in real money (euros).
The winner gets their Jackpot paid out in real money (euros).
Yes, I am over the age of 18 and I'd like to participate in the monthly Jackpot event.

A test Jackpot Battle will take place on Thursday!


Start:
  • All users are transferred to the battle map between 2:00pm and 2:10pm CET, and automatically placed under attack protection!
  • Once all pilots are there, the game can begin!

Procedure:
  • There are a variety of quarter-final battle maps, each one with up to 500 randomly assigned players.
  • For pilots who are shot down the battle ends immediately.
  • The surviving pilots will be transfered to the semi-final maps after a relevant announcement.
  • Once there are only 500 players remaining in total on all maps, another announcement will be made and all players will be transferred onto the final map.

Finish:
  • The last pilot flying will be declared the winner of the Jackpot Battle. If more than one player remains, there will be a draw to determine the winner.
  • Please keep in mind that this is a test, and that the battle may be interrupted before the usual conclusion.

Rules:
  • Test! The winner will receive no prize.
  • Test Jackpot Battle participation is completely voluntary and free.
Yes, I want to take part in the Test Jackpot Battle.
Refund due to a bug exploit
EP refund due to a bug exploit

Greetings SPACE PILOT!
Your journey to the final frontier is about to begin. It's time for you to show off the skills you learned at the Space Academy.

If you have any problems or questions, please contact

Greetings SPACE PILOT!
Your journey to the final frontier is about to begin. It's time for you to show off the skills you learned at the Space Academy.

If you have any problems or questions, please click %LINK_START%here%LINK_END%.
Use this test account to get an idea of the game. It'll be reset on a daily basis; so if you want to make progress, register for an account. Don't hesitate to contact us if you have any questions.

MEGA HAPPY HOUR AT DARKORBIT

You've fought bravely so far!
Take some time out to recharge your batteries and
come to the Mega Happy Hour - for the next full hour.

Order Uridium and get 3 for 1: Triple the Uridium for the same price using all payment methods except for bank transfers. Get 90,000 Uridium instead of just 30,000, for example!

Blast off into the next battle fully charged!

Three mighty companies have been waging war in outer space for centuries now.

The stories you heard growing up inspired you to enroll in the Space Academy and do your bit to end this war.

Exploring unknown galaxies and discovering strange space phenomena is what you've always wanted to do. Now that you've graduated, you can fulfill your dreams and join a company.

Serve your company well and fight bravely for power, energy and resources. The fate of the universe rests in your hand!

GREETINGS SPACE PILOT,
YOUR SPACE JOURNEY IS ABOUT TO BEGIN.

HERE ARE SOME USEFUL TIPS FOR THE FUTURE:

1. YOUR COMPANY WILL GIVE YOU A SHIP AT THE VERY BEGINNING OF THE GAME. YOU CAN FIND IT IN THE HANGAR.
2. CLICK ON START TO EXPLORE THE GALAXY AND COLLECT RAW MATERIALS.
3. EXCHANGE RAW MATERIALS FOR CREDITS AT THE SPACE STATION.
4. EQUIP YOUR SHIP WITH NEW WEAPONS, SHIELDS, ETC. IN THE HANGAR.
5. TAKE ADVANTAGE OF COMPANY OFFERS IN THE HANGAR, THE TRADING POST, THE LAB ... AND CLIMB TO THE TOP OF YOUR COMPANY!

IN THE HANGAR, YOU'LL FIND ALL THE INFORMATION YOU NEED TO KNOW ABOUT YOUR SHIP.

IF YOUR SPACESHIP IS DESTROYED IN BATTLE, VISIT THE HANGAR TO HAVE IT REPAIRED.

YOU CAN ALSO BUY OTHER SHIPS IN THE HANGAR AS WELL AS A WIDE RANGE OF WEAPONS, GENERATORS, LASER AMMUNITION, ETC.

NEED BETTER EQUIPMENT FOR YOUR SHIP?

THEN GET IT HERE!

YOU CAN EITHER PURCHASE EQUIPMENT AT AN AUCTION OR BUY IT IMMEDIATELY.

PAY WITH URIDIUM AND THE EQUIPMENT IS ALL YOURS!

YOU CAN TAKE ADVANTAGE OF NEW RESEARCH IN THE LAB.

IF YOU REFINE ORE IN YOUR LAB, YOU CAN USE IT TO ENHANCE YOUR SPACESHIP.

UPGRADE YOUR SHIP'S EQUIPMENT BY CLICKING ON "UPGRADE" IN THE LAB AND DRAGGING YOUR REFINED ORE ONTO THE EQUIPMENT YOU'D LIKE TO UPGRADE.

UNITED YOU ARE STRONG!

JOIN TOGETHER WITH OTHER SPACE PILOTS TO PUT YOUR COMPANY AHEAD.

YOU CAN JOIN A CLAN OR FOUND YOUR OWN HERE.

IF YOU ALREADY JOINED A CLAN YOU CAN SEE WHO ELSE HAS JOINED, TOO.
WRITE MESSAGES TO OTHER CLAN MEMBERS OR READ MESSAGES IN YOUR CLAN INBOX.

YOU CAN BUY EQUIPMENT FOR YOUR SPACESHIP WITH CREDITS OR URIDIUM.

JUST EXCHANGE YOUR URIDIUM FOR CREDITS.

IF YOUR ACCOUNT IS EMPTY,
YOU CAN FILL YOUR ACCOUNT UP HERE.

OR BECOME A PREMIUM MEMBER AND ALWAYS HAVE LOTS OF EXTRA ADVANTAGES!

MISSIONS ARE A GREAT WAY TO GAIN VALUABLE EXPERIENCE.

YOUR COMPANY WILL OFFER YOU MISSIONS TO COMPLETE IN EXCHANGE FOR EXPERIENCE POINTS AND CREDITS.
USE YOUR EARNED CREDITS AND EXPERIENCE POINTS TO UPGRADE YOUR SHIP AND LEVEL UP.

START YOUR ENGINES NOW: THERE ARE PLENTY OF AVAILABLE MISSIONS TO COMPLETE - SHOW 'EM WHAT YOU CAN DO.

BLAST OFF INTO UNEXPLORED GALAXIES FAR, FAR AWAY!

THE SKYLAB IS YOUR GUARANTEE FOR MORE RAW MATERIALS AND BETTER RESOURCES!

1. UPGRADE YOUR COLLECTORS AND GET MORE PROMETIUM, ENDURIUM AND TERBIUM!
2. UPGRADE YOUR SOLAR AND BASIC MODULES FOR MORE POWER AND BETTER WEAPON UPGRADES!
3. THE TRANSPORT MODULE WILL FERRY RAW MATERIALS/RESOURCES BETWEEN YOUR SHIP AND THE SKYLAB!
4. BOOST YOUR WEAPONS WITH THE NEW RESOURCE SEPROM AND ATTACK WITH MORE POWER THAN EVER BEFORE!
Your Uridium advance! It doesn't get any easier: Exchange pounds for Uridium easily and conveniently! There are no additional costs.
Select from £10, £25 or £49 worth of Uridium.
We'll transfer 30,000 Uridium (£10), 75,000 Uridium (£25) or 150,000 Uridium (£49) to your game account for you to use immediately!
You can pay for the Uridium within the next 7 days!
This advance is the interest-free way of keeping your account in the black!
If you haven't paid within the given time, your account will be suspended until the payment has been made.
Yes, I agree to the conditions.
Your account has been suspended or banned due to the use of bots or scripts. If you have any questions, please contact Support.
DarkOrbit | Battle for the title in Space Cup 2012!
Space Cup 2012 is the ultimate soccer extravaganza in DarkOrbit. Join the fray and fight for your company and the title! Play today!
You can't open this gift yet!
The day's date must match the number on the calendar door.
The date on the door you selected has already passed.

Every day you can open a new door on the Winter Calendar until January 24th. Each door unlocks a reward, so make sure you don’t miss out because once the day has ended, the door will be sealed until the next year.

Get a daily reward by opening the relevant door of the Winter Calendar. Don't forget to come back and open the new door every day, as if you miss out the door will be sealed. This offer lasts from the 1st to the 24th January 2017!
The regular Daily Login Bonus will still be handed out every day. Have a look: click here.
What surprises are hidden in the Solar Calendar. You'll need to login every day to ensure you grab all of them, because miss a day and you miss that prize!
